subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: Madison Square Garden, which has not been home to an N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament game since 1961, will host the East Regional in 2014.
snippet: Madison Square Garden, which has not been home to an N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament game since 1961, will host the East Regional in 2014.
